heisigStory: This character depicts a bolt of cloth wrapped around a pole. From there it gets its meaning of a towel.
koohiiStory1: If it looks like a towel, speaks like a towel and walks like a towel... I wonder why Heisig didn´t include this one (as an actual kanji) in RtK 1.
kunYomi: おお.い、ちきり、きれ、はば
myStory: khăn. miếng vải để vắt lên dây
words:
布巾(ふきん): tea-towel, dish cloth
雑巾(ぞうきん): dust cloth
